name: Plumeria Side Table
description: The Plumeria Side Table by Kifu Paris is a dramatic and sculptural piece. The cream shagreen inlaid top sits on clusters of bronze-patina brass legs that are conceptually inspired by bird feathers floating on top of a lake. The border of the top is accentuated by a subtle and elegant bronze-patina brass indentation detail. Designed by Kifu Augousti, this piece can be purchased as part of a nesting set. It is available in various finishes and is handmade in the Philippines.
